description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface, including living beings. The user can create any number of body parts and use them for offense, defense, reconnaissance, or restraint.

users.circumstances: Robin ate the fruit as a child in Ohara

abilityReveals.description: Robin sprouts one hundred arms to create a defensive barrier or to restrain opponents. The technique is named after the Delphinium flower.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Robin uses this technique to immobilize and defeat Kirintauros, a giraffe centaur on Punk Hazard.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
If the sprouted body parts are damaged, the user feels the pain

strengths.strength: Can sprout body parts on any surface within range
strengths.description: Allows for versatile combat and reconnaissance abilities.
Demonstrated when Robin easily immobilized Kirintauros.
